  // Resolve

  always @(posedge clk) begin
    if ( ADD_SUB == ADDER ) begin
      if ( out_d > Amax_d2 ) begin
        out_d2 <= out_d - Amax_d2;
      end else begin
        out_d2 <= out_d;
      end
    end else begin // SUBSTRACTER
      if ( out_d[A_WIDTH] == 1'b1 ) begin
        out_d2 <= Amax_d2 + out_d;
      end else begin
        out_d2 <= out_d;
      end
    end
  end
